name: algorithm
description:
NAME
ALGORITHM - perform graph traversal (DFS/BFS), make skeleton and shortest path calculation

SYNOPSIS
ALGORITHM [-h]
ALGORITHM -d |-b graphname [user_way] start_vertex
ALGORITHM -s | -t graphname

DESCRIPTION
ALGORITHM performs graph traversals using Depth-First Search (DFS) or Breadth-First Search (BFS), and calculates shortest path matrices.
Example of DFS traversal:
A → B → D → C
Example of BFS traversal:
A → C → B → D
Example of shortest path matrix:
0 2 1
4 0 1
8 9 0

COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS
-h, --help - display this help text
-d, --dfs - perform Depth-First Search traversal
-b, --bfs - perform Breadth-First Search traversal
-s, --shortest_path - calculate shortest path matrix
-t, --skeleton_tree - calculate skeleton tree
